title: Did Brazil's president Paulonaro Evely COVED-19 transform the vaccine into crocodiles?
subtitle: He also said that he would not receive vaccination during the launch of a mass vaccination programme in Brazil.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Brazilian President Geyer Paulonaro said: "In the Fizer Decade it is very clear: "We are not responsible for any side effects." If you turn into a crocodile, it's your problem.
